text: Allah ta’ala ne behetreen kalaam naazil farmaya hai, jo aisi kitaab hai, ke aapas mein milti jhulti aur baar baar duhraayi hoyi aayato ki hai, jis se un logo ke romte khade ho jaate hai, jo apne rab ka khauf rakhte hai, aaqir mein un ke jism aur dil Allah ta’ala ke zikr ki taraf narm ho jaate hai, ye hai Allah ta’ala ki hidaayath, jis ke zariye jise chaahe raahe raasth par laga deta hai aur jise Allah ta’ala hee raah bhula de, us ka haadi koyi nahi
